pr_title: client-side panels: support rosterEntries in blocks and memories

timeline.message: client-side panels: support rosterEntries in blocks and memories

timeline.bodyText: @rhwood I'd appreciate suggestions for handling the id here. (last parm, set to 0 for now)
timeline.author: mstevetodd

replies.bodyText: Use request.id instead of 0.  request is a JsonRequest and will have the correct value for any context (the JsonRequest is a container  for data about the JSON message which avoids many methods needing 6 or more parameters).
replies.author: rhwood
